title: Strong ETH holds for regular resolution.
abstract: We obtain asymptotically sharper lower bounds on resolution complexity for k-CNF's than was known previously. We show that for any large enough k there are k-CNF's which require resolution width (1-~O(k -1/4 ))n, regular resolution size 2 (1-~O(k -1/4 ))n , and general resolution size (3/2) (1-~O(k -1/4 ))n .
